name: @diiiazote/redis-rate-limit
author: Alex Vencel
description: A simple rate limiter for Redis using ioredis, works with Node based apps (Express, Next.js, Hono, etc.)

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:types && bun run build:compile
scripts.build:compile: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --packages=external
scripts.npm:prepublish: bun run build && bun run test
scripts.npm:publish: npm run npm:prepublish && npm publish && npm run git:tags
